action.des: Defensive Substitution: Jolbert Cabrera replaces second baseman Brian Roberts, batting 1st, playing left field.
Defensive Substitution: Justin Christian replaces center fielder Adam Jones, batting 2nd, playing center field.
Defensive Substitution: Oscar Salazar replaces first baseman Aubrey Huff, batting 4th, playing first base.
Scott Moore remains in the game as the third baseman.
Defensive switch from left field to second base for Ryan Freel.
Defensive Substitution: Robby Hammock replaces right fielder Nick Markakis, batting 3rd, playing right field.

atbat.des: Alberto Gonzalez flies out to center fielder Justin Christian.
Lastings Milledge grounds out, shortstop Cesar Izturis to first baseman Oscar Salazar.
Nick Johnson grounds out, second baseman Ryan Freel to first baseman Oscar Salazar.

action.des: Defensive Substitution: Kory Casto replaces first baseman Nick Johnson, batting 2nd, playing first base.

atbat.des: Ryan Freel strikes out swinging, catcher Jesus Flores to first baseman Kory Casto.
